name: Deuter Giga Bike 28L Daypack - Unisex
description: Protect your laptop and peripherals from wetness and splashes on your bike commute. A vented back system and wrap-around wings on the hips steady the pack and pamper you while you ride. An integrated rain cover keeps your things dry in case the clouds burst when you're halfway to work.Airstripes back system and mesh at hips and waistbelt provide excellent venting.2 large main compartments: one fits a laptop, the other holds books or files.Large front pocket with organizer slots for cables and accoutrements.Detachable key holder.Zippered front pocket for maps or documents.Padded base protects contents when the pack is set down.Stowable helmet holder.Reflective loop holds a blinky light.Reflective details offer night-time visibility.Includes a custom-fit raincover for foul-weather riding.
